# SEQ15 Instructions

## Description
Sequence 15 focuses on transformation of local shops and gathering places

## Category
Towns

## Patterns
apl090, apl091, apl092, apl093, apl094

## Emergent Phenomena
Local economies that provide for daily needs and social gathering within walking distance

## Overview
This sequence contains 5 pattern(s) that work together to create the emergent phenomena described above.
